name: Roley Poley
description:
My Game for the 68.9th TriJam. This game was made in three hours.

The theme was: Opposite Ends

So in this game you control both wheels on the opposite ends of a pole independently. You could also play this as a cooperative multiplayer game where each player controls one wheel.

This Jam Game includes 5 Levels.

Some focus on platforming, some on puzzles and some are more on the concept side of things.

This game was made with Godot.

Source Code: https://github.com/TLochow/Roley-Poley
